meanings.definition: Relating to a particular situation or set of circumstances.
meanings.sent1: The situational decision was based on the current weather forecast.
meanings.sent2: Her situational awareness helped her navigate through the crowded market.
meanings.sent3: The situational irony of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His situational humor lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent5: The situational analysis revealed key insights into the problem.

meanings.definition: Involving or dependent on a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: The team's success was situational and not based on skill alone.
meanings.sent2: Her situational anxiety only arose in crowded places.
meanings.sent3: The situational challenge brought out the best in the team.
meanings.sent4: His situational adaptability allowed him to thrive in any environment.
meanings.sent5: The situational factors influenced the outcome of the experiment.
